testcase.name: Check results by selecting Location filter
testcase.system-out: Given user is on careers page...............................................passed When user selects a location................................................passed Then jobs available at the location are displayed...........................passed

testcase.name: Check results by selecting Department filter
testcase.system-out: Given user is on careers page...............................................passed When user selects a department..............................................passed Then job title shown only for the department................................passed

testcase.name: Check results by selecting Work Type filter
testcase.system-out: Given user is on careers page...............................................passed When user selects a work type...............................................passed Then titles with selected Work Type are displayed...........................passed

testcase.name: Check results by selecting Location, Department, Work Type filter
testcase.system-out: Given user is on careers page...............................................passed When user selects any location, department, work type.......................passed Then results are updated....................................................passed

testcase.name: Check clear filters functionality
testcase.system-out: Given user is on careers page...............................................passed And user have selected some filters.........................................passed When user clicks on clear filters...........................................passed Then all jobs are displayed.................................................passed

testcase.name: Check search functionality
testcase.system-out: Given user is on careers page...............................................passed When user inputs a particular job title.....................................passed Then respective job is displayed............................................passed

testcase.name: Check search functionality for invalid inputs
